structure.unit: RELIGIOUS, CHARITABLE, AND EDUCATIONAL SOCIETIES -- NONSTOCK, NONPROFIT CORPORATIONS

text.section: The Secretary of State shall immediately forward one (1) of the exact or conformed copies of the articles of dissolution to the secretary of revenue.
A corporation shall be dissolved upon the effective date of its articles of dissolution.

law.history: Amended 2015 Ky. Acts ch. 34, sec. 72, effective June 24, 2015. -- Amended 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 23, sec. 207, effective January 1, 1989. -- Created 1968 Ky. Acts ch. 165, sec. 48.
